extensionDescription.message: Efficiently manage and organize your tabs.
extensionDescription.description: Description for the extension in the manifest

nameCurrentSession.description: Placeholder text for the session input

saveSession.description: Button text for saving a session

openTabs.description: Heading for the open tabs column

pleaseEnterSessionName.description: Error message when session name is empty.

sessionSaved.description: Confirmation message when session is saved.

errorSavingSession.message: Error saving session. Please try again.
errorSavingSession.description: Error message when saving session fails.

sessionDeleted.description: Confirmation message when session is deleted.

errorDeletingSession.message: Error deleting session. Please try again.
errorDeletingSession.description: Error message when deleting session fails.

errorActivatingTab.description: Error message when activating tab fails.

sessionOrderUpdated.description: Confirmation message when session order is updated.

tabOrderUpdated.description: Confirmation message when tab order is updated.

errorRenderingTab.description: Error message when rendering a tab fails.

drag.description: Alt text for drag handle image.

close.description: Alt text for close button image.

openInNewWindow.description: Alt text for open in new window button image.

delete.description: Alt text for delete button image.
